meta.name: description
meta.content: YouthBuild Philly's physical building will be closed until it is safe to reopen. Service will continue to be provided to all students, alumni and applicants. Click here for a letter from our Executive Director regarding our Continuity of Education Plan. YouthBuild Philadelphia Charter School gives young adults a second chance to earn a high school diploma,…

body.class: home page-template-default page page-id-3078 wp-custom-logo customizer-styles-applied singular standard-menu highlander-enabled highlander-light custom-colors

article.class: post-3078 page type-page status-publish has-post-thumbnail hentry

div.h2: YouthBuild Philly’s physical building will be closed until it is safe to reopen. Service will continue to be provided to all students, alumni and applicants. Click here for a letter from our Executive Director regarding our Continuity of Education Plan.
div.p: YouthBuild Philadelphia Charter School gives young adults a second chance to earn a high school diploma, gain hands-on work experience, and transform their lives.

article.class: post-3080 page type-page status-publish has-post-thumbnail hentry

div.p: Stay up to date on the latest news and student success stories from YouthBuild Philly.
Interested in YouthBuild Philly? Complete our Application.
Make a gift to support our school.

article.class: post-8703 post type-post status-publish format-standard has-post-thumbnail hentry category-5584 tag-feature tag-featured

h2.a: MLK Day of Service- #YBserves at Stephen Girard Elementary School

div.p: January 20, 2020— For the YouthBuild Philly community, MLK Day represents a day of service, reflection and impact, rather than a day off. In honor of the life and legacy of Dr. Martin Luther King, Jr., more than 200 YouthBuild Philly students, alumni, staff and community partners joined together to revitalize the hallways of StephenContinue reading MLK Day of Service- #YBserves at Stephen Girard Elementary School →

li.a: A Letter from Our Executive Director
MLK Day of Service- #YBserves at Stephen Girard Elementary School
